body:
Once you have an ATen context object, you can just call `lazyInitCUDA()` and get a `THCState*`. Then, you can pass that into the THCS functions.

Also, please remember that we're using GitHub issues for bug reports only, and all questions should be posted on [our forums](https://discuss.pytorch.org).
